sources.title: IDrinkYourBlood IEatYourSkinDoubleFeatureTrailer
sources.description: Original theatircal trailer for legendary 1970 Grindhouse/Drive-in Horror Double "I Drink Your Blood" and "I Eat Your Skin"

sources.title: I Drink Your Blood (1971) Hippie horror meets viral madness in this cult classic!
sources.description:
When young Pete unleashes a rabid twist on Horace Bones' sinister cult, their chaotic descent into madness turns a quiet town into a battleground of survival. As infected followers wreak havoc, Pete and his family must outwit the bloodthirsty horde before it's too late!

UNCENSORED version: https://youtu.be/qTlaZcgt96I

Original title: I Drink Your Blood
Alternative title: Phobia

Director & Writer: David E. Durston

Main cast:
Bhaskar Roy Chowdhury - Horace Bones
Jadin Wong - Sue-Lin
Riley Mills - Pete Banner
Elizabeth Marner-Brooks - Mildred Nash
Richard Bowler - Doc Banner

Genres: Horror movie, Exploitation
Release date: January 20, 1971
Filming location: Sharon Springs, New York, USA


00:00 Full Movie with subtitles
00:20 Horace Bones leads his cult in a sinister ritual, setting the stage for chaos.
13:20 Grandpa Banner confronts Horace and his followers, but the encounter turns violent.
28:44 Pete shoots a rabid dog, sparking his plan for revenge against the cult.
36:16 Pete contaminates the meat pies with rabid dog blood, unwittingly unleashing viral madness.
47:44 The infected cult members spiral into violence as the town reels from the outbreak.
1:01:07 Dr. Banner and Roger Davis realize the rabies threat and rally the townsfolk to defend themselves.
1:13:46 Sylvia and Andy desperately barricade themselves as the rabid horde closes in.
1:21:32 Police arrive just in time for a final showdown, as survivors fight for their lives.


https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: A band of satanist hippies roll into a town and begin terrorizing the local folk. They rape a local girl and her grandpa goes after them. He fails and is given LSD. This bothers his grandson and he gets back at the hippies by feeding them meat pies infected with blood from a rabid dog. They turn into crazed lunatics and begin killing and/or infecting everything in their path.
metadata.Actors: Bhaskar Roy Chowdhury, Jadin Wong, Rhonda Fultz
